recipe.name: Angelica Liquer
recipe.preparation: Crush together fennel, anise, corriander seeds and cloves a bit.  Chop the angelica stems and mix with seeds in a large preserving jar.  Add the sugar and vodka and let sit someplace sunny for two weeks, swirling the mixture daily.Strain through a cheesecltoh into a sterilized bottle and seal.  Let set up for at least four months.  The final note is "drink in small quantities with a piece of angelica in each glass"
recipe.source_name: Ingram, Christine, Roz Denny, and Ketherine Richmond. Vegetarian and Vegetable Cooking. Anness Publishing Ltd: Hermes House, 2002. 142
